Class WordList

java.lang.Object
WordList
public class WordList extends Object
This class stored and uses the text from the text files entered into the checker. It stores 3 lists, one a list of the original text file parsed at each space, another stores the previous list with all punctation removed and set to all lower case, and the final list contains each unique word in the text and how many times it appears. The functions to read from the text file and transform it to these list is also contained here.

    WordList(String filePath)
    Creates an instance of the WordList class, taking in a filename, reading the file and parsing the raw text into a list

    int
    getWordCount()
    Returns the word count of the file stored in this list (that aren't contained within quotation marks)
    void
    wordFrequencyCounter(boolean includeQuotes)
    Creates the list for the word frequency counter, looping through the list of altered words and checking that word against every other word in the list, counting each time that word appears and marking them as checked for future loops through the text, resulting in a list with the number of times each unique word appears.

    • WordList

      public WordList(String filePath)
      Creates an instance of the WordList class, taking in a filename, reading the file and parsing the raw text into a list
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • cleanWordList

      public void cleanWordList()
      Creates a list based on the raw parsed text from the document to remove all punctuation (aside from mid word hyphens) and turning it to lower case

    • wordFrequencyCounter

      public void wordFrequencyCounter(boolean includeQuotes)
      Creates the list for the word frequency counter, looping through the list of altered words and checking that word against every other word in the list, counting each time that word appears and marking them as checked for future loops through the text, resulting in a list with the number of times each unique word appears.
      Parameters:
      includeQuotes - Boolean to decide whether words within quotes should be included in the count

    • findWordCount

      public int findWordCount(String wordToLook)
      Returns the count of a word in the frequency word list (0 if not in the list)
      Parameters:
      wordToLook - The string that is being looked for
      Returns:
      The number of times the parameter string appears in the text file

    • getWordCount

      public int getWordCount()
      Returns the word count of the file stored in this list (that aren't contained within quotation marks)
      Returns:
      Int containing the word count of the file
